metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Letter thanking Stearns for his care and guidance of his son, Sung Sing, saying that it is important to have Stearns, a Christian-like and liberal minded person to look after the Chinese students, who will contribute to their country's improvement. He encloses a draft for $500 for his son's expenses.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
